notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: All the authors contributed to carry out this study. JBS was the principal investigator, OA and GSSN contributed to evaluate the anti-salmonellal activities. CNT, ANB and NK contributed to the fractionation purification and structural elucidation of isolated compounds. NK revised the manuscript, AK and DG co-supervised the work. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
